opennlp.ccg.perceptron
Class Model

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.perceptron.Model

public class Model
extends Object

A model is a vector of weights for an alphabet. A model can be read from a file, which starts with the number of features on one line, followed by one line per feature pairing the feature name with its weight. A new model with all zero weights can also be created from an alphabet. The main routine tests the model on an event file.

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $, $Date: 2009/11/09 18:54:30 $
Author:
Michael White
